mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "Looking Toward 1950...", "In Oklahoma","Island Twisters Throw A Party", "Meet Our Guest Caller" , This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "Ideal Corral", "Round the Outside Ring" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). The article "So Your Going to Visit in Texas" is a featured article is intended to help dancers from one part of the country mix in happily with those in Texas. This volume also features a "Green Sheet" supplement which gives news for Southern California square dancers.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
